long_description: An ideal top for cold-weather running, the men's Patagonia Thermal Flyer shirt features a soft merino wool blend that offers just the right amount of moisture-wicking warmth. Merino wool naturally insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors; blended recycled polyester in fabric boosts durability. A touch of spandex adds stretch for a fit that won't feel constrictive. Minimal seams are designed for exceptional next-to-skin softness. Shaped, fold-over cuffs create makeshift mittens to keep your hands toasty. The men's Patagonia Thermal Flyer shirt features a slim fit.
